text: I'm a very funny little rat.  I'm not afraid of cats - the way I lie down on this piece of cheese proves it.  And remember:  2020 is my year.  But the reason I'm so good looking is that my creator is very skillful and a true friend. Thank you very much.  <3
Great video and a fantastic and FUN Xmas decoration that's unique- LOVE IT!!  Well done my friend xx
Очень симпатичная и потешная мышка! Поделка обязательно вызовит улыбку и поднимет настроение!!! Спасибо за радость!

I love your little mouse and Christmas tree. They are so pretty and cute at the same time. Make wonderful gifts to give to friends are family. Or just keep for yourself. Thank you. You have a wonderful day.
He is a cute little guy. When you did the legs and tail did you wrap it around another piece of jute?
